alert.note: Alert for Granville; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:26PM EDT until May 21 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Person County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Granville County in central North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rougemont, or 10 miles southeast of Roxboro, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Bethel Hill, Mayo Reservoir, Surl, Moriah and Hyco Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
